ygData.subject: AC & Agility
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay folks, I just got two I think they were serpentine bracers (AC 1 Dex +2?maybe 3, Agility +9) Well my ranger has two bracers at the moment with 6ac a
ygData.messageBody:
Okay folks, I just got two I think they were
serpentine bracers (AC 1 Dex +2?maybe 3, Agility +9) Well my
ranger has two bracers at the moment with 6ac a piece.
When I put on my new bracers I loose a lot of AC. I
want to know since agility means less hits and damage,
whether or not loosing this AC is a bad thing or will my
new agility help out more?<br><br>Kinda confused.
Tried both ways against the same conned creature and it
seemed with new bracers i got hit more. Please help
out.<br><br>Mykeal<br>Ranger of the 17th season in worship of our magnificant
Lady Tunare.
